name: Ragnarok, The Legacy
description: Ivar, a young viking, is destined to save the 9 kingdoms from Ymir's grip. To do this, he will have to survive the hordes of different monsters (draugr, jotunn). He will also have to evolve, gain to defeat legendary monsters (Fenrir, jormungand) in order to accomplish this quest this quest given by Odin.
